description:
As one of the fastest growing independent beauty brands, Pixi Beauty has built an incredible worldwide reputation and is quickly becoming one of the most recognized brands in the industry.

Your Role:
We are looking for a skilled Director of Ecommerce to develop and carry out our strategic online development plans for our Pixi and POP brands. You will be responsible for the digital maintenance and development of our properties and will progress our digital presence forward during our next step of growth. 

Responsibilities
* All Pixi and POP online properties' maintenance and development.
* Being responsible for site management in regards to product updates, creative assets, press and store locations.
* Being responsible for inventory management to ensure inventory levels are healthy; orders, sales and deliveries are controlled.
* Managing overall web development to enhance website to suit the customer journey best.
* Ensuring content is consistent, updated and without mistakes.
* Reviewing online analytics to recommend website improvements. 
* Being responsible for A/B testing to ensure top performing content.
* Partaking in quality assurance and quality control measures.
* Leading on site promotions, from asset creation to managing coupon codes (dynamic and static).
* Staying up-to-date with the latest technology and trends within the digital environment.
* Working with Marketing Department to align content with latest strategy. 
* Analyzing data; creating reports and presentations for Senior Management when appropriate.

Requirements
* Bachelor's degree required in Marketing, Technology or related field.
* Must have 5+ years of experience with web development or digital management.
* Must have experience with Ecommerce backend systems (Shopify a Plus).
* Must be proficient in Google Analytics and other reporting systems.
* Working knowledge of HTML and CSS languages a plus.
* Must be proficient in Microsoft Excel and other internal softwares.
* Must be proactive, a self-starter and thrive within a fast-paced environment.
* Must have strong organization skills and have a keen eye for detail.
* Must have excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
* Must possess a high level of integrity and be flexible to changing conditions.
* Experience in and passion for the beauty industry is a plus.
